reviewText: this brings back old memories. I used to watch this show when I was a kid. this dvd has a good collection of episodes. after watching this now I want to see the complete series I did not even know that those were out on dvd. good show. if you have not seen this dvd then I recommend you do

many healthcliff movies
will buy more
my kids enjoys these tapes
love the older cartoons
worth the money and good quality
It was a christmas gift for my 6 year old grandson, he loved terror of the neighborhood..He watches them over and over,and dosen't watch tv.
I enjoyed coming home from school and watching Heathcliff as a kid and now my daughter does too.
I'm glad Heathcliff finally made it to DVD (don't know why it took so long).  It certainly brings back a lot of memories. Now, if only UAV would release Beverly Hills Teens too!
My prayers have been answered; Heathcliff one of my favorite show's as a child of the 80's is on dvd for me to share with a new generation. Buy this, and send a message that people want Heathcliff!
